page.title: 06Whittington Church part 2
page.content: SSS The services are about an hour and some about an hour and a half. The church has a magazine called"The Foursome"because it is the magazine for the four churches in the Whittington and Andoversford area.He conducts two or more marriages a year,for there are more older people than younger.He conducts more funerals than marriages because the older are dieing. During the week he does do activities for the children but only Brownies,Cubs and Scouts. The church originally came from The BlackMountains in Wales in the twelth century.Later it was transfered down to Gloucestershire.Then the monastries were used for schools.In 1540 the mmonastries dissolved and ever since there has been a vicar.
